amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow actions that would lower prices for gasoline, diesel, oil, or other motor fuels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to allow actions that would lower prices for gasoline, diesel, oil, or other motor fuels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Loebsack amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 238 (Roll no. 521).
